summary: Client requested Sarah to schedule a vision meeting. The PM asked for a project name; architect, developer, and QA gave no comments (not_addressed).

actions.task: Schedule the vision meeting requested by the client
Determine or collect suggestions for the project name and communicate it to the team

risks.risk: Lack of input from architect, developer, and QA may delay planning and leave requirements unclear
risks.mitigation: Follow up with each role to solicit input before the vision meeting, assign clear owners and deadlines, and confirm the project name prior to the meeting
